an6.98:1.1: “‘So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kanci sankharam niccato samanupassanto anulomikaya khantiya samannagato bhavissati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an6.98:1.2: ‘Anulomikaya khantiya asamannagato sammattaniyamam okkamissati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an6.98:1.3: ‘Sammattaniyamam anokkamamano sotapattiphalam va sakadagamiphalam va anagamiphalam va arahattam va sacchikarissati’ti netam thanam vijjati.
an6.98:2.1: ‘So vata, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sabbasankhare aniccato samanupassanto anulomikaya khantiya samannagato bhavissati’ti thanametam vijjati.
an6.98:2.2: ‘Anulomikaya khantiya samannagato sammattaniyamam okkamissati’ti thanametam vijjati.
an6.98:2.3: ‘Sammattaniyamam okkamamano sotapattiphalam va sakadagamiphalam va anagamiphalam va arahattam va sacchikarissati’ti thanametam vijjati”ti.
